name: Flux Auto
headline: General Autonomy for Controlled Spaces
description:
Flux Auto is building autonomous mobility technology to fully automate the movement and operation of vehicles in controlled spaces. Using Flux's solutions customers can reduce their dependency on human drivers, while also increasing productivity and reducing operating costs. 

Flux is currently deploying in warehouses, farms and mines.

founders.name: Pranav Manpuria, Founder
founders.description:
Founder and CEO at Flux Auto, building autonomous driving technology for controlled spaces. 

I pursued a business administration degree from Illinois Tech, Chicago, before moving back to India to explore my entrepreneurial interests. Flux Auto is the only autonomous vehicle company to successfully run vehicles in real time road and traffic scenarios in India. I previously built a payment startup in India, and am a deep tech, racing and football enthusiast.

founders.name: Abhishek Gupta, Founder
founders.description:
COO at Flux Auto, building autonomous driving technology for trucks.

I handle all the day to day operations to ensure everyone in our team has the right direction and all the resources they need. I also plan and oversee our testing activities. 

Previously built a drone platform with custom cameras and data processing systems for farmers to better understand crop health.

generated_description:
### Flux Auto: Revolutionizing Controlled Spaces with Autonomous Mobility

**Mission Statement**: At Flux Auto, we're committed to general autonomy for controlled spaces. Our goal is to transform how vehicles move and operate in environments like warehouses, farms, and mines by building cutting-edge autonomous mobility technology.

**Company Overview**: Founded in 2017 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, Flux Auto is based in Houston, Texas. With a dedicated team of 56 employees, our focus is on empowering businesses to reduce reliance on human drivers while simultaneously increasing productivity and cutting operational costs.

**Technology & Applications**: Flux Auto specializes in deploying autonomous solutions for a variety of industries. Our technology automates crucial operations such as:
- **Pallet Hauling**: Autonomously transporting pallets without human intervention.
- **Trailer Unloading**: Unloading freight seamlessly and safely.
- **Order Picking**: Streamlining order fulfillment through automated pallet jacks.
- **Farming**: Operating tractors and controlling implements autonomously.

At the heart of our operation is the **Flux Universal Autonomy Platform**, which retrofits existing machinery with AI capabilities to extend their lifespan and improve efficiency.

**Key Benefits**:
- **Higher Productivity**: Flux systems can operate continuously without breaks, maximizing your output.
- **Lower Operating Costs**: By enabling completely driverless operation, we help cut costs across your fleet.
- **Addressing Driver Shortages**: Our AI technology fills the gap left by human driver shortages, allowing for uninterrupted operations.
- **Enhanced Safety**: With 360-degree sensors, our systems make precise decisions and can revert to manual mode when needed.
- **Scalability**: Deploy Flux solutions quickly, expanding to new sites in just days without extensive preparation.

**Why Choose Flux?**:
- **No Hardware Changes**: Easily integrate our systems with your existing vehicles using a bolt-on solution.
- **No Infrastructure Changes**: Flux tech operates without requiring modification to your site’s layout.
- **Adaptive Processes**: Our AI adapts to your existing workflows, ensuring a seamless transition to automation.
- **Affordability**: Built using state-of-the-art machine learning and mapping algorithms, our solutions are designed to be cost-effective.

**Our Investors**: Supported by reputable backers including Y Combinator, Flux Auto is well-positioned to lead the charge in autonomous mobility.

**Conclusion**: At Flux Auto, we believe the future of logistics, farming, and mining lies in efficient, autonomous operations. If you want to see our technology in action or explore partnership opportunities, reach out to us through our website.

For more information, visit [Flux Auto](https://fluxauto.xyz).
